Act I - Post-Angler.requires: (|@Act I:5| and |Squirrel| and ({ItemValue(act_1_offense:7)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:5,act_1_defense:4)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:5,act_1_utility:3)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:4,act_1_defense:3,act_1_utility:2)})) or |@act1disabled|

Act I - Post-Trapper.requires: (|@Act I:8| and |Squirrel| and ({ItemValue(act_1_offense:9)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:6,act_1_defense:5)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:6,act_1_utility:4)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:5,act_1_defense:4,act_1_utility:3)})) or |@act1disabled|

Act I - End.requires: (|Caged Wolf| and |@Act I:11| and |Squirrel| and ({ItemValue(act_1_offense:11)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:8,act_1_defense:6)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:8,act_1_utility:5)} or {ItemValue(act_1_offense:7,act_1_defense:5,act_1_utility:4)})) or |@act1disabled|

Act III - Initial Gauntlet.requires: (|@Act III:4| and |Empty Vessel| and ((|Shieldbot| and (|Energy Bot| or |Double Gunner|)) or |Sniper Bot|)) or |@act3disabled|

Act III - Pre-Bridge.requires: (|@Act III:6| and ({ItemValue(act_3_offense:6)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:5,act_3_defense:3)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:5,act_3_utility:3)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:4,act_3_defense:3,act_3_utility:2)})) or |@act3disabled|

Act III - Post-Bridge.requires: (|@Act III:10| and ({ItemValue(act_3_offense:8)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:3)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:1,act_3_defense:4)} or {ItemValue(act_3_defense_bridge:6)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:8,act_3_utility:7)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:1,act_3_utility:6)} or {ItemValue(act_3_utility_bridge:6)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:6,act_3_defense:5,act_3_utility:4)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:2,act_3_defense:3,act_3_utility:2)} or {ItemValue(act_3_defense_bridge:5,act_3_utility_bridge:5)})) or |@act3disabled|

Act III - End.requires: (|@Act III:12| and ({ItemValue(act_3_offense:9)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:4)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:2,act_3_defense:5)} or {ItemValue(act_3_defense_bridge:7)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:9,act_3_utility:8)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:2,act_3_utility:7)} or {ItemValue(act_3_utility_bridge:7)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense:7,act_3_defense:6,act_3_utility:5)} or {ItemValue(act_3_offense_bridge:2,act_3_defense:4,act_3_utility:3)} or {ItemValue(act_3_defense_bridge:6,act_3_utility_bridge:6)})) or |@act3disabled|
